casebody.data:
No. 10-6930. Alvaro Augustin Mejia, Petitioner v. United States. 562 U.S. 1037, 131 S. Ct. 586, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 8778.

178 L. Ed. 2d 427,

November 8, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.

Same case below, 389 U.S. App. D.C. 340, 597 F.3d 1329.
